lead_paragraph: Medical experts and trainers have seen a steep increase in hip injuries this season, even among superstar players, and have yet to determine the exact reasons behind the trend.
snippet: Medical experts and trainers have seen a steep increase in hip injuries this season, even among superstar players, and have yet to determine the exact reasons behind the trend.
